casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
James Robert KOZOMAN. No. 602P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 6, 2006. James Robert Kozoman, Pro Se. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Sam Currin, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 2nd day of June 2006 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Granville County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of June 2006."
